professionalBacking.source: Spitzer, R. L., Kroenke, K., Williams, J. B., & Löwe, B.
professionalBacking.reference: A brief measure for assessing generalized anxiety disorder: the GAD-7. Archives of internal medicine, 166(10), 1092-1097.
validationStudies: Spitzer et al. (2006) - Original validation study
professionalBacking.validity: Excellent internal consistency and test-retest reliability

instructions: Please read each statement carefully and select the response that best describes how often you have been bothered by the following problems over the past 2 weeks.
disclaimer: This questionnaire is for screening purposes only and does not constitute a medical diagnosis.
